articles.description: Crypto falls on macro wobble, Yen fears. OI wiped in BTC drop to $56k, funding negative. Altcoins down 13% YTD, stablecoin supply up 30%. BTC mining profitability at record low: JP Morgan. FBI says North Korea targeting BTC ETF issuers. Trump family to launch DeFi project on ETH. Trump project linked to AVAX’s Dough Finance. Trump family members hacked during launch. AI coins underperform after Nvidia investigation. MATIC upgrade to POL begins. TON falls as Telegram faces issues in many countries. VC funding & BTC correlation breaks down. We have entered crypto’s ‘corporate phase’. Gensler will leave regardless of election: Ripple CEO. Harris campaign has asked Coinbase for advice. Penpie DeFi project hacked for $27m. Galois Capital settles with SEC over FTX custody.

SOL to see significant unlocks in Q1. Japan considers dropping crypto tax to 20%. Rate cuts won’t help BTC: Hayes. BTC should double after rate cuts: Tapiero. Mr 100 linked back to Upbit wallet. WazirX hacker moves funds to Tornado. SUI to launch handheld gaming device. Sony & PYTH announce collaboration.

articles.description: Kabosu, the dog many know as Doge and the mascot of Dogecoin, sadly passed away earlier this year. Its owner later adopted another Shiba Inu called Neiro which caused a long blockchain civil war with multiple tokens battling it out for liquidity. Now a month later SlumDOGE, the man who became a millionaire off Dogecoin (but never sold), explains why Neiro is a moment for the dog coin community to unite.

Ethereum has surged 10% since last Friday, marking a notable bounce as the crypto market reacts to local demand levels. Despite this uptick, ETH has been lagging behind Bitcoin and other altcoins in recent months.
 
 
Key data from Santiment, however, highlights an uptick in network activity, hinting at a potential shift in Ethereum’s performance. Although ETH continues to face challenges in reclaiming the crucial $2,500 zone, this period of volatility could present a strategic opportunity.
 
Investors might want to consider this moment as a chance to position themselves for anticipated future gains. With the current momentum and increasing network engagement, Ethereum’s rally could be on the horizon, offering a promising outlook for those ready to capitalize on its rebound.

articles.description:
The cryptocurrency market is no stranger to volatility, and Ethereum (ETH) has been at the center of it. Recently, Ethereum (ETH) whales have been quiet, leading to price stagnation, but the latest developments suggest that we might see a change. A large withdrawal of 40,000 ETH from derivatives platforms has drawn attention, signaling a potential rally. At the same time, Mpeppe (MPEPE), a decentralized casino project, is making waves in the altcoin space, attracting significant interest from ETH whales.
 
Ethereum Whales Quiet Since July: A September Comeback? 
Since July, Ethereum (ETH) whales, who have historically influenced ETH’s price, have reduced their activity. On-chain data shows that addresses holding over 10,000 ETH have been either selling or redistributing their holdings, con…

With the cryptocurrency market showing increased volatility, Ethereum (ETH) holders are making strategic moves, adding Quant (QNT) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) to their wallets. As these two projects continue to gain momentum, investors are seeing the potential to turn a modest $2,000 investment into a remarkable $20,000. Both Quant (QNT) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) offer distinct advantages that cater to different segments of the crypto space, making them ideal additions for any diversified portfolio.
 
Quant (QNT): A Gateway to Blockchain Interoperability 
Why Quant (QNT) Continues to Attract Ethereum Investors 
Quant (QNT) has carved out a niche for itself as a leading blockchain interoperability solution. Its Overledger technology allows seamless communication between various blockchain networks, making …
articles.title: ETH Holders Add Quant (QNT) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) To Their Wallets As They Turn $2000 Into $20000

articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.description:
Quant (QNT) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are emerging as standout projects with massive potential for growth. Both offer unique value propositions that cater to different segments of the crypto community. Here are three compelling reasons why both Quant (QNT) and Mpeppe (MPEPE) are predicted to skyrocket by 150% in the near future.
 
Quant (QNT)’s Institutional Adoption and Cross-Chain Technology 
Quant (QNT)’s rising popularity can be attributed to its Overledger technology, which facilitates interoperability between various blockchain networks. articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
The Federal Bureau of Investigation, or FBI, reports that cryptocurrency fraud losses jumped a whopping 45% to $5.6 billion in 2023, while complaints of scams involving digital assets have grown, with nearly 69,000 filed by victims across the country.
 
 
The investment scams turned out to be the most prevalent, accounting for 71% of the total losses reported to the FBI. These scams exploit the fear of missing out on cryptocurrency market gains by promising big profits. The report also shows that California, Florida, and Texas had the most complaints.
 
 
Victimizing Elderly People: FBI
 
The report presents a very serious cause of concern from the demographic point of view: Individuals above 60 years were the largest victims of the scam, by losses to the tune of almost $1.6 billion. Still…
articles.title: Crypto Fraud Explodes To $5.6 Billion – FBI Urges Caution In New Alert

articles.author: Sam White
articles.description:
For many years, crypto has been fended off accusations of being a solution in search of a problem. Another way of putting it is that product-market fit is an issue, or that crypto needs a killer app. It’s worth distinguishing here also between bitcoin and the rest of crypto. Bitcoin can claim a category of its own as a digital store of value, but when it comes to the rest of the blockchain environment, a wide variety of potential use cases are on the table but still unproven.
 Stablecoins have perhaps the clearest case for immediate utility, and then there’s the tokenization of real world assets, the use of NFTs in gaming, entertainment and as a medium for digital art, and there’s also DeFi as an alternative financial environment (although then there are still questions as to what specific…
articles.title: Polymarket Makes Crypto-Betting Mainstream: Is It a Killer App?
